tool.name: Assign Material Parameter
tool.description: Assign material parameters to a VTK Unstructured Grid based on a CSV file.

data.name: output_file
data.label: Output VTK File with Assigned Material Parameters

tool.help: This tool assigns material parameters from a CSV file to a VTK Unstructured Grid. The CSV file should have the material IDs in the first column, followed by the material parameters.

citations.citation: Ahrens, James, Geveci, Berk, Law, Charles, ParaView: An End-User Tool for Large Data Visualization, Visualization Handbook, Elsevier, 2005, ISBN-13: 9780123875822
